title: New York: it's sun-sational
creator_credit: State of New York, Department of Commerce
brief_description: A travelogue presenting the highlights of the state of New York, including the Niagara Falls, Saratoga, Albany Islands, St Lawrence Seaway, Woodstock, Syracuse, New York State Fair.
